yarangi.graphics.quadraturin
Class QuadVoices

java.lang.Object
  yarangi.graphics.quadraturin.QuadVoices
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener, IEventManager, StageListener, Loopy
public class QuadVoices
extends Object
implements IEventManager, Loopy

Used to aggregate the regular AWT keyboard and mouse events, transformed mouse events, cursor hover and picking events and whatever else that will become a requirement in the future. Runs in a separate thread. All accumulated event are dispatched at once. TODO: append CursorMotionEvent listener that fires GUIEvents? TODO: replacing the AWT event queue shall be more efficient.

Author:
Dve Yarangi
